channel.title: Half-Life 2:Episode 3The Closure
channel.description: I didn't play it,yet,but I saw gameplay from Valve News Network.I think if I'll find some fangame bugs i'm gonna report you.Anyways cutscenes athmosphere is like GMod Half-Life fan movies "idiots of garry's mod" youtube series and it's the same as original Half-Life climate,but it's still looking great.Where's Alyx Vance brand new model from Valve Software concept art and model sheets from original canceled Half-Life 2 Episode 3?

item.title: Half-Life 2:Episode 3The Closure
item.dc:creator: TheHalf-Life3
item.description:
I didn’t play it,yet,but I saw gameplay from Valve News Network.I think if I’ll find some fangame bugs i’m gonna report you.Anyways cutscenes athmosphere is like GMod Half-Life fan movies “idiots of garry’s mod” youtube series and it’s the same as original Half-Life climate,but it’s still looking great.Where’s Alyx Vance brand new model from Valve Software concept art and model sheets from original canceled Half-Life 2 Episode 3?

Read full topic
